overview.title: Overview
overview.content:
PDF to EPUB Converter is a free online tool that converts fixed-layout PDF documents to EPUB format, which is ideal for e-readers.
 EPUB is a reflowable format suitable for reading on smartphones and tablets, allowing flexible text size adjustment and column layout.
 This tool makes it easy to convert PDFs to EPUB without complicated operations, making it useful for reading, studying, document repurposing, and many other scenarios.

items.title: Optimized for Smartphones and Tablets with EPUB Format
items.description: Unlike fixed PDFs, EPUB automatically adjusts text and layout to your screen size with reflowable format. This makes reading on smartphones and tablets significantly more comfortable.

items.title: Enables Text Search and Highlighting
items.description: After converting to EPUB, you can use e-reader features like search, highlighting, and bookmarks, making it convenient for studying and reading long texts. Highly recommended for students and book lovers.

items.title: Completely Free, No Registration, No Installation
items.description: A simple online conversion tool ready whenever you need it. No email registration required, accessible anytime from PC, smartphone, or tablet.

items.title: Compatible with Many E-book Readers
items.description: Converted EPUB files can be used with a wide range of EPUB-compatible readers including Kindle (with compatible apps), Kobo, Google Play Books, and more. Easily create your own digital library.

questions.question: Will PDF layouts be preserved exactly?
questions.answer: EPUB is a reflowable format, so fixed layouts will be restructured. This is designed to make content more readable with adaptive formatting.

questions.question: Can PDFs with images be converted?
questions.answer: Yes, not only text but also images and figures will be placed in the EPUB as much as possible, though adjustments may be needed depending on the original PDF structure.

questions.question: Which devices can read EPUB files?
questions.answer: You can view EPUBs on most major e-book apps and devices including Kindle, Kobo, Google Play Books, and Apple Books.

questions.question: How long does conversion take?
questions.answer: Typical documents complete in seconds to under a minute. Larger files may take a bit longer.

questions.question: Are uploaded PDFs saved on your servers?
questions.answer: No, uploaded files are automatically deleted after conversion is complete and are not stored on our servers.
